titleStmt.title: Several conferences between a Romish priest, a fanatick chaplain, and a divine of the Church of England concerning the idolatry of the Church of Rome, being a full answer to the late dialogues of T.G.
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.W. for H. Mortlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Stillingfleet. cf. BM.
T.G. is Thomas Godden. cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
